message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality and condition.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $200 represents the value of this item, I'm willing to come down to $170 for you. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit hesitant, Alice. I was thinking more like $140. Can you meet me in the middle?
